title: nIyE enadu jIvan
sahitya:
nIyE enadu jvan ninadu bhakti enadu mukti


anupallavi

  tAyE en karuNai mikka tandaiyE un anbu mikka
sEyE yAn unadu cittam sheivadE en uivadAmE


caraNam    sakala kalaiyum vEdAgama shAstramum katrOr pOTrum
jaga jIva para jnAnamum saguNa nirguNa bhAvamum
ihapara gatiyellAm unadu suguNagAna sukham onrE
ahamahavena anavaratamum anbaruLLE ADiginra
